timeline.message: Updates release notes with new features, improvements & bugfixes summary for release 6.1.0 & 6.1.1

Merge pull request #11820 from cdapio/docs-update

Update release notes + License dependencies for 6.1.0 & 6.1.1 releases
Updates java version + cdap-default.xml MD5 hash checksum

Merge pull request #11823 from cdapio/docs-update

Updates MD5 checksum for cdap-default.xml for docs build
Fix minor typo in release notes

Merge pull request #11826 from cdapio/bugfix-docs/fix-typo

Fix minor typo in release notes
Updated version to 6.1.1

Merge pull request #11829 from cdapio/bugfix/bump-version

Bump distributions version to 6.1.1
(CDAP-16212) Make querying of CDAP entities more efficient

Merge pull request #11858 from cdapio/feature_release/CDAP-16212-backport

(CDAP-16212) Make querying of CDAP entities more efficient
[CDAP-16298] Fixes UI to load namespaces before showing any links that has namespace. This is to prevent navigating to an incorrect link without namespace
(CDAP-16309) Use the correct classloader for program startup

Merge pull request #11872 from cdapio/feature_release/CDAP-16309-fix-missing-spark

(CDAP-16309) Use the correct classloader for program startup

[UI][Pipelines] Lazyload runs & runscount for only viewed pipelines

  - Adds natural-sort to sort pipelines by name in graphql resolver
  - Fixes graphql server to fetch runs & total runs count for only first 25 pipelines
  - Disables sorting by columns other than pipeline name
  - Lazy load runs & runscount only for pipelines currently in view

    As part of this change the following have been changed,

      1. Moved pipelines and the filteredPipelines to store
      2. Any modifications done to the current viewed pipelines is always saved to store
      3. This way we can determine currently viewed pipeline for which we need to fetch the runs
      4. Upon fetch we save the runs and runscount to both the filtered pipelines & the full list.
   This way we avoid refetching them multiple times

  - Fixes the property we check while pausing & resuming polling in datasource

Merge pull request #11859 from cdapio/bugfix-ui/sort-pipelines-byonly-name

[UI][Pipelines] Lazyload runs & runscount for only viewed pipelines

Merge pull request #11867 from cdapio/bugfix-ui/CDAP-16298

[CDAP-16298] Fix timing issue in loading namespace before navigating to any page

(CDAP-12361) Refactoring and cleanup of MetadataStore

- Speedup SQL queries
-- Reduce usage of unnecessary post query filter
-- Better multiscan query
(CDAP-16280) Remove methods that promote inefficient usages

Merge pull request #11873 from cdapio/feature_release/CDAP-16280-cherry-pick

(CDAP-12361) (CDAP-16280) Cherry pick perf improvement to release
Merge branch 'release/6.1' into merge-6.1
fix graphql merge issues
